In April of this year, I had the pleasure of giving the opening keynote at the Thinking Creatively Conference 10th Anniversary. Naturally, I was asked to speak about my experience on the Obama campaign in 2012. So, I put together a talk called Building Obama which went into detail about the various products & tools under BarackObama.com and how we designed, built and optimized them for tens-of-millions of users around the world.

Below is the video of my talk, along with my slides via SpeakerDeck.
